meanings.definition: (ラテン語)～の下に行く、近づく、耐える、経験する、～の後に続く、～の心に浮かぶ
meanings.english_definition: (Latin) to go under, approach, undergo, endure, succeed, come to mind

examples.translation: 山の下に行こう。（山に登ろう）
我々は多くの困難に耐えなければならない。

verb_forms.present_indicative: subeo, subis, subit, subimus, subitis, subeunt
verb_forms.imperfect_indicative: subibam, subibas, subibat, subibamus, subibatis, subibant
verb_forms.future_indicative: subibo, subibis, subibit, subibimus, subibitis, subibunt
verb_forms.perfect_indicative: subii/subivi, subisti, subit, subiimus, subistis, subierunt/subiere
verb_forms.pluperfect_indicative: subieram, subieras, subierat, subieramus, subieratis, subierant
verb_forms.future_perfect_indicative: subiero, subieris, subierit, subierimus, subieritis, subierint
verb_forms.present_subjunctive: subeam, subeas, subeat, subeamus, subeatis, subeant
verb_forms.imperfect_subjunctive: subirem, subires, subiret, subiremus, subiretis, subirent
verb_forms.perfect_subjunctive: subierim, subieris, subierit, subierimus, subieritis, subierint
verb_forms.pluperfect_subjunctive: subissem, subisses, subisset, subissemus, subissetis, subissent

usage_notes.explanation: ラテン語の動詞で、文脈によって様々な意味を持ちます。物理的な動きから抽象的な概念まで表現できます。
